set_configured_ip_unknown_current_ip.message: cannot set configured IP: unknown current IP

set_configured_ip.name: Set configured IP
set_configured_ip.description: Set the configured IP for a specified link to the current IP address. Useful on links tha use dynamic public IP addresses that can change periodically.

reset_configured_ips_all.name: Reset configured IPs for all links
reset_configured_ips_all.description: Reset the configured IP for all links to the IP address specified in the configuration, if present. Re-compute the configured IP addresses for all other links, once all links are up and have unique IP addresses.
